snippet: Mr. Scott, a jazz singer, will be honored by Dr. John, Sam Moore, Andy Bey, Chuck Jackson, and Antony — of the group Antony and the Johnsons — at a service in Harlem on Oct. 25.
abstract: Mr. Scott, a jazz singer, will be honored by Dr. John, Sam Moore, Andy Bey, Chuck Jackson, and Antony — of the group Antony and the Johnsons — at a service in Harlem on Oct. 25.

headline.main: Dr. John and Others to Pay Tribute at Jimmy Scott Memorial
